scripts.start: npm run build && npm run open
scripts.build: concurrently -p "[{index}:{name}]" -n "main,server,browser,sass" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgYellow.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "npm run build-main" "npm run build-server" "npm run build-browser" "npm run sass-watch"
scripts.open: concurrently -p "[{index}:{name}]" -n "sass,server,electron" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold,bgGreen.bold" "npm run sass-watch" "npm run server" "npm run electron"
scripts.sass: node-sass --indent-type tab --indent-width 1 --linefeed crlf --output-style expanded --precision 10 src/browser/sass/styles.scss -out-file dist/browser/styles.css
scripts.sass-watch: node-sass -w --indent-type tab --indent-width 1 --linefeed crlf --output-style expanded --precision 10 src/browser/sass/styles.scss -out-file dist/browser/styles.css
